org.ietf.nea.pb.batch

Class PbBatchHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pb.batch.PbBatchHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Data, TnccsBatchHeader, TnccsData

    public class PbBatchHeader
extends Object
implements TnccsBatchHeader
    IETF RFC 5793 TNCCS batch header.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PbBatchHeader

        PbBatchHeader(short version,
             PbBatchDirectionalityEnum directionality,
             PbBatchTypeEnum type,
             long length)
        Creates the header with the given values.
        Parameters:
        version - the batch format version
        directionality - the sending direction (e.g to server or client)
        type - the batch type (e.g. server retry, ...)
        length - the batch length
